name: Xump 2
description:
Xump 2 - Back to space is a simple multi-platform puzzler by Retroguru.

This game is an entry to the AtariAge  Atari Lynx 2020 Programming Competition!

Help Misuki to clean up deserted space fields. Luckily Holger borrowed out his headbot Xump, who will take over again. Clear all dissolving tiles on several single-screen levels by simply stepping on them, one by one. Few fields are secured with mines and need a double tap. Mines can be blown up when passing by or disarmed by Xump when staying on this specific field for a short moment. Certainly the mission sounds easier than it will be.
